channel.title: Pages on Uyen Hoang
channel.description: Recent content in Pages on Uyen Hoang

item.title: About
item.description: I am a Data Scientist located in Toronto, Canada. My recent work focuses on the development of hybrid design-and-model based methods for the following applications: To balance large-scaled non-probability samples To build segmentation tools for social and political ideologies To predict socio-demographics for online advertising I have over 4 years of work experience in the data science field. My recent experience includes the following companies: Mountain Equipment Co-op, Toronto, Canada Vox Pop Labs Inc.
